result.eng: I saw her while looking out the window.
result.ga: chonaic mé í agus mé ag féachaint an fhuinneog amach
result.orig: chonaic mé í agus mé ag féachaint an fhuinneog amach
result.html: chonaic mé í agus mé ag féachaint an fhuinneog amachI saw her while looking out the window.
result.ponchtml: ċonaic mé í agus mé ag féaċaint an ḟuinneog amaċI saw her while looking out the window.

result.eng: Do you mind if I open the window? - No I don't.
result.ga: an miste leat má osclaím an fhuinneog - ní miste
result.orig: an miste leat má osclaím an fhuinneog - ní miste
result.html: an miste leat má osclaím an fhuinneog - ní misteDo you mind if I open the window? - No I don't.
result.ponchtml: an miste leat má osclaím an ḟuinneog - ní misteDo you mind if I open the window? - No I don't.

result.eng: They should close every single window in the house.
result.ga: ba chóir dóibh gach uile fhuinneog sa teach a dhúnadh
result.orig: ba chóir dóibh gach uile fhuinneog sa teach a dhúnadh
result.html: ba chóir dóibh gach uile fhuinneog sa teach a dhúnadhThey should close every single window in the house.
result.ponchtml: ba ċóir dóiḃ gaċ uile ḟuinneog sa teaċ a ḋúnaḋThey should close every single window in the house.

result.eng: Click here to close the window.
result.ga: cliceáil anseo chun an fhuinneog a dhúnadh
result.orig: cliceáil anseo chun an fhuinneog a dhúnadh
result.html: cliceáil anseo chun an fhuinneog a dhúnadhClick here to close the window.
result.ponchtml: cliceáil anseo ċun an ḟuinneog a ḋúnaḋClick here to close the window.

result.eng: I am going to open the window.
result.ga: tá mé chun an fhuinneog a oscailt
result.orig: tá mé chun an fhuinneog a oscailt
result.html: tá mé chun an fhuinneog a oscailtI am going to open the window.
result.ponchtml: tá mé ċun an ḟuinneog a oscailtI am going to open the window.

result.ga: dún an fhuinneog le do thoil
result.orig: dún an fhuinneog le do thoil
result.html: dún an fhuinneog le do thoilClose the window, please.
result.ponchtml: dún an ḟuinneog le do ṫoilClose the window, please.

result.eng: The man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.
result.ga: bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straois
result.orig: bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straois
result.html: bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straoisThe man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.
result.ponchtml: ḃrúiġ an fear a ẛrón in aġaiḋ na fuinneoige agus rinne straoisThe man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.
